amendment.description: Amendment provides for a GAO study on potential methods, practices and incentives that would increase the degree to which low-income property owners living in high-risk locations participate in the National Flood Insurance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 109-530 to direct GAO to conduct a study on potential methods, practices and incentives that would increase the degree to which low-income property owners living in high-risk locations participate in the national flood insurance program. This study should be reported to Congress no later than 1 year after enactment of this legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
